topic.title: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE LOCAL APPEALS RESULTING IN ELIGIBILITY
topic.shortdesc: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE LOCAL APPEALS RESULTING IN ELIGIBILITY is the total number of NHS Continuing Healthcare Local Appeals completed in the REPORTING PERIOD that resulted in full or partial eligibility for NHS Continuing Healthcare.
